member.name: EVENT_FILTER_HEADER
member.summary: Defines the header data that must precede the filter data that is defined in the instrumentation manifest.

member.name: EVENT_FILTER_HEADER.Id
member.summary: The identifier that identifies the filter in the manifest for a schematized filter. The value attribute of the filter element contains the identifier.

member.name: EVENT_FILTER_HEADER.Version
member.summary: The version number of the filter for a schematized filter. The versionattribute of the filter element contains the version number.

summary.para: An identifier that identifies the session that passed the filter. ETW sets this value; the session must set this member to zero.

Providers use this value to set the Filter parameter of to prevent the event from being written to the session if the event data does not match the filter criteria (the provider determines the semantics of how the filter data is used in determining whether the event is written to the session).

member.name: EVENT_FILTER_HEADER.Size
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this header and the filter data that is appended to the end of this header.

member.name: EVENT_FILTER_HEADER.NextOffset
member.summary: The offset from the beginning of this filter object to the next filter object. The value is zero if there are no more filter blocks. ETW sets this value; the session must set this member to zero.
